name: Stranded on a Ship
description:
Submission Game for the Hackingtons Under 18 Falling Game Jam.

You (the player) has jumped from a ship trying to survive. You parachuted on a pirate ship destined to go to the Island of the Bears.  However, you have to fight zombies that fall from the heavens above! In order to be safe, you need to fight all the zombies and jump on the island in order to win the game! Goodluck! Since you are going to need it.  :)
